DDL.statement: CREATE TABLE `APP_WEIGHT_PRODUCT_GROUP` ( `PRODUCT_GROUP` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `NOMINAL_WEIGHT` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT NULL, `NOMINAL_WEIGHT_UOM` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, `TARE_WEIGHT` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT NULL, `TARE_WEIGHT_UOM` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`PRODUCT_GROUP`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_DETAIL` ( `SAMPLE_POINT` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `SAMPLE_DATE` datetime NOT NULL, `SAMPLE_SEQUENCE` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `SAMPLE_WEIGHT_DATE` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `SAMPLE_GROSS_WEIGHT` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `SAMPLE_NET_WEIGHT` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `SAMPLE_TARE_WEIGHT` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `SAMPLE_WEIGHT_UOM` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, `SAMPLE_T1_COUNT` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `SAMPLE_T2_COUNT` int(11) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`SAMPLE_POINT`,`SAMPLE_DATE`,`SAMPLE_SEQUENCE`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_HEADER` ( `SAMPLE_POINT` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `SAMPLE_DATE` datetime NOT NULL, `USER_ID` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `WORKSTATION_ID` varchar(25) DEFAULT '', `SCALE_ID` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `PROCESS_ORDER` varchar(10) DEFAULT '', `REQUIRED_RESOURCE` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `CUSTOMER_ID` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `MATERIAL` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `PRODUCT_GROUP` varchar(25) DEFAULT NULL, `CONTAINER_CODE` varchar(12) DEFAULT NULL, `TARE_WEIGHT` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `TARE_WEIGHT_UOM` varchar(3) DEFAULT '', `NOMINAL_WEIGHT` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `NOMINAL_WEIGHT_UOM` varchar(3) DEFAULT '', `TNE` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `NEG_T1` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `NEG_T2` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `SAMPLE_SIZE` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `SAMPLE_COUNT` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `SAMPLE_MEAN` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `SAMPLE_STD_DEV` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `SAMPLE_T1_COUNT` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `SAMPLE_T2_COUNT` int(11) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`SAMPLE_POINT`,`SAMPLE_DATE`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_POINT` ( `SAMPLE_POINT` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `LOCATION` varchar(35) DEFAULT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(35) DEFAULT NULL, `REQUIRED_RESOURCE` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`SAMPLE_POINT`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_WEIGHT_SCALE` ( `SCALE_ID` varchar(15) NOT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(25) DEFAULT NULL, `MAKE` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `MODEL` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `CONNECTION` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `BAUD_RATE` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `DATA_BITS` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `STOP_BITS` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `FLOW_CONTROL` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `PARITY` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `END_OF_LINE` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`SCALE_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_WEIGHT_TNE` ( `NOMINAL_WEIGHT` decimal(22,3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.000', `NOMINAL_WEIGHT_UOM` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'G', `TNE` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `NEG_T1` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `NEG_T2` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', PRIMARY KEY (`NOMINAL_WEIGHT`,`NOMINAL_WEIGHT_UOM`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `APP_WEIGHT_WORKSTATION` ( `WORKSTATION_ID` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(35) DEFAULT NULL, `LOCATION` varchar(35) DEFAULT NULL, `SAMPLE_POINT` varchar(25) DEFAULT NULL, `SCALE_ID` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `SCALE_PORT_ID` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`WORKSTATION_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;
